China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 13 日星期六 18:50:22 GMT 120
U.S. does not support Taiwan independence, Biden saysU.S. President Joe Biden said on Saturday the United States does not support the independence of Taiwan, after Taiwanese voters rebuffed China and gave the ruling party a third presidential term. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 15:25:18 GMT UO33ZVC6S5P27N3ODNEBEHYPJE https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-us-does-not-support-taiwan-independence-2024-01-13/Steve Holland, Nandita Bose, Trevor Hunnicutt世界
Taiwan's new president-elect will face China's ireTaiwan's new president-elect, Lai Ching-te, is likely to face his toughest task yet when he takes office in May and has to deal with the ire of China which has repeatedly denounced him as a dangerous separatist. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 13:18:27 GMT 3KBOGC3XAZJUZIO6Z2Q3LZZI3M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/taiwan-president-elect-lai-face-chinas-ire-after-victory-2024-01-13/Ben Blanchard世界中国
Tibet not in focus, repression persists: Exiled former leaderThe plight of Tibet has become less discussed internationally but repression continues and China is applying what it did there to other regions, a former head of the Tibetan government-in-exile said on Saturday. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 07:22:27 GMT E2VHGST3EBMFBLI7KVZRJSGSVY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/tibetan-issues-not-focus-repression-persists-exiled-former-leader-2024-01-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Blinken discusses human rights, Taiwan Strait with Chinese officialU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday raised concerns over China's human rights issues in a meeting with senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington, the State Department said, adding they also discussed "maintaining peace and stability" in the Taiwan Strait. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 00:50:23 GMT 3EHDGKEU2JMPFHCTUW2UB4D7GY https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-raises- human-rights-issues-meeting-with-senior-chinese-official-2024-01-13/Kanishka Singh世界
Taiwan's voters rebuff China and give ruling party third presidential termLai Ching-te's party, which champions Taiwan's separate identity and rejects China's territorial claims, was seeking a third term. Beijing framed the elections as a choice between war and peace. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 00:06:20 GMT KNSNU4B6A5OSXG5Q63SITRAPWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/polls-open-taiwans-ritic-elections-watched-closely-by-china-2024-01-13/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu世界亚太地区
China urges better financing coordination for housing sectorChina's housing ministry and financial regulator asked local governments to better coordinate with financial institutions to provide financing support to real estate projects, as policymakers work to revive the sluggish housing market. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 12:40:54 GMT FAFZLMFKKRO6LPJ6TCO7PTNNHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-urges-better-financing-coordination-housing-sector-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
